title: Leading games on Twitch as of July 2019 , by hours viewed
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of hours in millions for 10 number of Video Games.
The Number of hours in millions is appeared to be the highest at Video Game Fortnite and lowest at Video Game Apex Legends.
The difference of Number of hours in millions between the highest and lowest Video Game is 20.8.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Video Game in the x axis and Number of hours in millions in the y axis.
The Number of hours in millions is appeared to be the highest at Video Game Fortnite and lowest at Video Game Apex Legends.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of hours in millions for 10 number of Video Games.
The Number of hours in millions is appeared to be the highest at Video Game Fortnite and lowest at Video Game Apex Legends.
The difference of Number of hours in millions between the highest and lowest Video Game is 20.8.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Video Game, and Number of hours in millions in each Video Game on the y axis.
Video Game Fortnite has the highest Number of hours in millions and Apex Legends has the lowest Number of hours in millions.
The difference of Number of hours in millions between the highest and lowest Video Game is 20.8.
Video Game Fortnite is higher than any other Video Games with value 24.8, followed by League of Legends, and GTA V. Down to Video Game Apex Legends with the lowest value 4.0.
The average Number of hours in millions in all 10 Video Games is 10.29.
Summing up the values of all Video Games, we get total 102.9.
